attributes.action: Increase spending,use and coverage of public transport to be 24/7 not 0700 to 1800 Monday to Friday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Public transport is a joke it stop running at night or is greatly reduced between 1800 and 0700 why? Weekends it can be Nil.In a 24/7 country is it a wonder there road congestion. More money for AFFORDIBLE busses and trains and trams Gives 24/7 public transport and my car will stay at home.
